channel.title: Posts on Eitvydo Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Eitvydo Hugo Site

item.title: Code
item.description: int n = 100; std::vector<char> isPrime(n + 1, true); isPrime[0] = isPrime[1] = false; for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) { if (isPrime[i]) { std::cout << i << ' '; for (int j = i + i; j <= n; j += i) { isPrime[j] = false; } } }

item.title: Everest
item.description: Mount Everest, the tallest mountain in the world, continues to grow. Due to the collision of the Indian and Eurasian tectonic plates, Everest’s height increases by about 0.04 inches (1 millimeter) every year.
